attributes.action: Close UK boders for non essential travellers
attributes.additional_details: We are one of the few countries to remain open to the general public during this time
attributes.background: Currently there is a petition to close all UK borders which has been dismissed due to cargo and freight needs. This petition is asking for UK borders to be closed to all others unless they are medical workers and / or are citizens of the UK until further notice to stop the spread of covid19
